title: A latticed total K-theory
authors: Qingnan An, Chunguang Li, Zhichao Liu
abstract:
In this paper, a new invariant was built towards the classification of
separable C*-algebras of real rank zero, which we call latticed total K-theory.
A classification theorem is given in terms of such an invariant for a large
class of separable C*-algebras of real rank zero arising from the extensions of
finite and infinite C*-algebras. Many algebras with both finite and infinite
projections can be classified.
